description:
The app is simple enough that it doesn't have too many options that usually confuse users, and its defaults are very nice. I used it professionally and I'm so happy to have found this app finally.
The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a way to save changes in the document format for futer documents, so if you want lined background pattern, you have to change it every time you start a new document.
summary: The best app I've used so far

description: Perfect for studying and academic work for me
Since the newest version everything works great (Surface Pro 7, Fedora 39)
Everything is fine, but there is no option for drawing shapes like circle, ellipse. It would be good if these features are added.
Ermöglicht einen angenehmen Workflow. Minimalistisch und gut durchdacht.
It has serious flicker under Wayland with nVidia GPUs which makes is borderline usable for me on nVidia systems as it has not native Wayland support but uses XWayland. AMD is fine though.
